name: Andreas Harter
what_is_my_connection_to_javascript: Backend developer and novice JavaScript programmer looking forward to close a knowledge gap. Not a lot of professional experience with JS, only during my spare time.
what_can_i_contribute: I am a good listener and capable of grasping a topic quickly and look at it from different (sometimes unique) angles. I also like to go down into the rabbit hole: Currently, I am looking into the PPC port of V8.
